name: Hello, Boris.
description:
Follow Boris in fufilling his dreams, collecting items along the way.

MADE FOR WEEKLY GAME JAM 91

WILDLY BEHIND ON SCHEDULE :0

WILDLY UNFINISHED

" A " and " D " to move

" E " to interact with doors, sign posts, and bus stops

" I " to open the item inspector

" M " to open the map
